VA’s Role in Assisting Agencies With Eligibility Determinations for Certain Federal Programs
Agencies responsible for administering the benefit programs described in
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart ii, 3.C.1.a
may contact the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to verify that a Veteran, who is also a legal alien,
meets the definition of “Veteran,” as set forth in
38 U.S.C. 101
,
1101

1301

38 U.S.C. 107

Honorable

fulfilled the minimum active duty service requirements of
38 U.S.C. 5305A(d).

circumstances under which government agencies may request verification from VA, and
actions VA is responsible for taking upon receipt of such requests.
